text: Aleksandr Vitalievich Gordon (26 December 1931 - 7 December 2020) was a Russian actor and movie director. He was born in Moscow. His career began in 1956. His best known role as George in The Killers (1956). He directed and wrote the 1957 student movie There Will Be No Leave Today. Gordon died on 7 December 2020 in Moscow, just a few weeks before his 89th birthday.Умер работавший с Тарковским режиссер Александр Гордон ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Russian movie actors Category:Russian television actors Category:Russian movie directors Category:Russian screenwriters Category:Actors from Moscow Category:Writers from Moscow
title: Aleksandr Gordon
